property.name: title
property.description-key: The title to be displayed in the confirmation dialog.

property.name: subtitle
property.description-key: The subtitle to be used displayed in the confirmation dialog.

property.name: text
property.description-key: The message to be displayed in the confirmation dialog.

property.name: confirmButtonLabel
property.description-key: The cancel button label. If you do not specify the cancel button label, Cancel is used as the button label.

property.name: cancelButtonLabel
property.description-key: The message to be displayed in the alert dialog.

property.name: height
property.description-key: Height of the confirmation dialog in pixels.

property.name: width
property.description-key: Width of the confirmation dialog in pixels.

property.name: displayState
property.description-key: display state of the confirm dialog.

property.name: confirmDialogResponse
property.description-key: Returns an object with the confirmed (Boolean) attribute is passed that indicates whether the confirm button was clicked to close the dialog.
